Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff but Terribly Noisy Rooms”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed family harmony hotel istanbul 3 nights found hotel disapointing family door connecting space little walk bed bathroom set suitcase noise incredible hotel main route leading sultanahmet immediately train tracks endless traffic road trains passing late night sleep challenge staff friendly accomodating redeeming characteristic definitely recommend staying bit farther hill immediate street train track noise check flamingo apart similar price quiter street steps blue mosque etc wish stayed entire time istanbul
